name: Nemesis
temple_description:
Nemesis was the cold and ruthless Goddess of Vengeance in Greek mythology, also known as the goddess of Ramnos.
She represents ruthless justice and will condemn those who are arrogant in front of the gods. Those who are cursed by her will fall into endless misfortune.

active_skills.name: Relentless Justice
active_skills.effect: Applies [Afterimage] state on self, increases 30% EVA for 3 rounds

active_skills.name: Holy Vengeance
active_skills.effect: Converts 8% of total DMG as self-healing
